content.text: Hi! I'm Mike. What's your name?
Hello Mike, my name is Ashley. It's nice to meet you!
You too! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to dance and I enjoy spending time with my loved ones.
Those are both great hobbies! I like to watch Netflix in my spare time.
That's fun! What kind of shows do you like to watch?
I like to watch comedy shows and action movies.
Those are both great genres! I love to watch comedy shows too.
I love to watch The Office. It's so funny!
I've heard good things about that show. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great show.
What's your favorite thing to do with your loved ones?
I love to go on hikes with them. We also like to go to the movies and play games together.
Those sound like fun things to do! I love going on hikes too.
They're great ways to spend time with loved ones.
I agree! They're also good for exercise.
Yes, they are! I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests
